title.rendered: What Do I Need to Join the 1xBet Affiliate Program?

content.rendered:
You probably already heard from friends or relatives that they started a website and joined an affiliate program to start making money online. It sounds like something that you’d like to try as well but you’re worried it’s a complicated process and you won’t be able to handle it? There’s absolutely nothing to worry about. At 1xBet, everything is designed to make the entire experience pleasant and get the most out of your activity. So, forget everything negative you heard about other affiliate programs because 1xBet partners is taking things to a whole different level.

These days, an affiliate program is one of the most effective ways to make money online. There are many criteria that you should focus on when choosing an affiliate program. The best affiliate programs offer a profitable commission, timely payments and value their reputation. In such a competitive environment, it becomes very difficult for potential partners to make a choice, so we decided to tell you more about the 1xBet affiliate program.

The principle of the affiliate program

Let’s start by understanding how the affiliate program works. After registration, each partner will be able to generate unique links that users of his resource will be able to follow. Thanks to this identification method, there is no doubt as to which players you brought to the brand’s website.

The partner then promotes the brand product on their own website. All users who came from the partner’s site and start playing on 1xBet are permanently assigned to the partner. This ensures long term earning potential on the affiliate program.

Getting started with 1xPartners

So, you’ve already set up a website on a topic you know a lot about and you’re getting some traffic already. This is the perfect moment to start thinking about joining an affiliate program because even if the traffic on your website isn’t that massive, it’s better to start early. Plus, joining our partner program will also give you access to plenty of helpful articles on how to increase traffic and many more helpful tools to make the most out of your activity.

The 1xPartners affiliate program is ready for cooperation, and the registration process is hassle-free. All you need to do is go to the affiliate program website and click the “Register” button. Unlike many other affiliate programs, at 1xPartners the registration process will not tire you with a lot of fields and will not require a huge amount of information. Here’s what you need to complete to get started:

Username – choose the username you want to use to log into your partner account

Password – the password to keep your account safe

Confirm Password – enter the password once again to make sure there are no typos in it

Site – enter the URL for your website

Site category – you can choose the domain your website approaches if you want to. This field is not mandatory

Preferred language – choose the language you want for the dashboard

How did you find about us – another field that is not optional but could help us deliver better services to people just like you that want to take their first steps becoming betting affiliates.

Once you’re done with this part of the registration process, another form will show up asking for some more personal details. We need this information so that we can get in touch and let you know when your account is approved. Also, this is the part where you decide on the payment option to receive the funds. The fields are:

– Name

– Surname

– Email

– Skype – optional

– Phone Number – optional

– Country

Fill out the form and wait for the moderator to process the request. The waiting period does not exceed 48 hours. And of course, participation in the 1xBet affiliate program is completely free.

1xBet Affiliate Program Payment Options

Depending on the region where you’re joining, you will be able to choose several ways to get your affiliate earnings from 1xBet.You can either go for popular eWallets like Neteller, Skrill or QIWI. If you want to get the funds via Bank Transfer, you can do that as well. 1xBet can pay to any bank in the world.

Another option to get your funds from our affiliate program is to create a player account with 1xBet. The funds will be transferred to your player account and then you have over 200 payment options to choose from. The account can not be used to play the 1xBet games or bets so there’s nothing to worry about.

How to promote a product and make money from it

For 1xBet, affiliates play an important role. The company appreciates reliable partnerships, offering in return a high level of commission, high-quality promotional materials and much more.

Partner sites can promote 1xBet extensively. However, affiliates are not limited to promoting 1xBet on a website only. You can carry out similar activities on social networks, instant messengers and other sites.

You can read more about ways to increase the profit of your site in our article.

What other benefits does the 1xBet affiliate program provide?

The affiliate program of 1xBet offers incredibly favourable conditions to its partners such as:

weekly payments, more than 200 payment methods for withdrawals, and marketing support that helps partners earn more.

Each partner is valuable, that’s why 1xPartners provides an individual approach to each affiliate, plus a support service that is ready to advise or resolve queries at any time.

Reliability and quality – that is what defines the 1xBet affiliate program. The proof of this is the international recognition that the affiliate program received at the 2019 SBC Awards.

“The Most Innovative Affiliate Program” is a status secured not only by the prestigious SBC Award, but also by the many years of experience working with thousands of partners.

That’s it! This is everything you need to join the 1xBet affiliate program. All the big betting affiliates had to start from 0 so there’s nothing preventing you to make it big as well. With the help of 1xBet affiliate program, you will have much higher chances of reaching your goal and make money online. Become a partner now and boost your affiliate business to make the most out of it. Our network has over 20,000 betting partners across the globe. Join us and take serious steps towards boosting your profit!

Become a part of the leading affiliate program from a top betting brand – 1xBet.
